main: Gains {status:BlackCloudBlade} if there are 2 or more Kurokumo identities on the field (including herself so she only needs 1 more).
Gains {status:EngageToBattle}, if 3 or more Kurokumo allies have died.
When triggering her passive at 3 {keyword:Lust} Res., she gives one Kurokumo ally {status:BlackCloud}. At 4 Res., she gives it to all Kurokumo allies instead of only 1.
S3 triggers {status:Laceration} an additional 3 times, making it very strong if the enemy has a high {status:Laceration} stack, but also risks breaking the stack early.
other: Each Kurokumo ally that dies gives her a {status:SlashResultUp} for the rest of the fight.
{status:EngageToBattle} gives her more {status:SlashResultUp}, some {status:SlashDamageUp} and more bonus {status:Laceration} application
{status:BlackCloud} converting the unit's skills to {status:SuperCoin}, increases their {status:Laceration} application, and nullifies Stagger on them.

S2 gives {status:AttackDmgUp} to 2 Kurokumo allies, and if 6+ Kurokumo units are deployed (including herself), she gives 4 stacks to all 5 of the others instead. Having 6+ Kurokumo units also adds {status:Vulnerable} application to it.

1081101.desc:
Combat Start: if there are 2+ allied Kurokumo Clan Identities in this Encounter, including this unit, gain 1 [BlackCloudBlade]

Combat Start: apply 1 [BlackCloud] to Kurokumo Clan Identities adjacent to this unit on the Dashboard
1081101.name: Gathering Dark Clouds

1081102.desc:
When a Kurokumo Clan ally dies, gain 1 [SlashResultUp] for this Encounter

When 3 or more Kurokumo Clan allies are defeated, gain [EngageToBattle] for this Encounter
1081102.name: Battle Ready

1081111.desc:
Combat Start: if there are 2+ allied Kurokumo Clan Identities in this Encounter, including this unit, gain 1 [BlackCloudBlade]

Combat Start: apply 1 [BlackCloud] to Kurokumo Clan Identities adjacent to this unit on the Dashboard
- At 4+ Lust Reson., apply 1 [BlackCloud] to all other Kurokumo Clan allies
1081111.name: Gathering Dark Clouds

1081121.desc: 1 ally with the fastest Speed inflicts +1 more [Laceration] Potency or Count with Skill and Coin effects against enemies
1081121.name: Cloud Workshop Blade
